alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 28 at 2:00PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD WATCH is IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy showers is possible WHERE...all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Wednesday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A trough remains over the territory through Wednesday. The trough is expected to produce continuous rainfall, thunderstorms, and gusty winds during heavy downpours. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 200 Aoauli Aso Lua Mati 28 2023 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE Aso Lulu... MAFUAAGA...O timuga mamafa o le a mafua ai ona fa`atupula`ia lologa ma tafega NOFOAGA...motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lulu AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau ma nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o le a tumau i luga o le atunu`u e oo i le Aso Lulu. O nei uiga louloua o le tau o le fa`atupula`ia ai timuga e fa`aauau pea, faititili, fa`apea savili agi fa`ata`uta`u i taimi e mamafa ai timuga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
